column4: Hi, in 8.10 how can I select which video driver my computer loads? !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
How do I select which one i want to laod though
if you have a module you want to load then use modprobe drivername
How is it choosing fglrx though?  I don't see any mention of it in xorg.conf....so how do i select which one I want?
boot time probably your runlevel is picking it up
SO my question is where is it choosing fglrx from?  Is it defined in a file?
because I see no mention of it in there
I see linux-restricted-modules-common when I look at the entries when i type ls
